thread.section_title: 45: A daily diary of the Donald Trump administration transition - POLITICO
thread.title: Trump picks new policy staffers
thread.title_full: Trump picks new policy staffers - POLITICO

author: politico.com
title: Trump picks new policy staffers

organizations.name: department of health and human services

text:
President-elect Donald Trump continued to build out his White House team Thursday with a slew of staffing announcements across different policy areas. The announcements included positions on the domestic policy council, the office of the senior adviser to the president for policy and the national trade council.
Andrew Bremberg, a former staffer at the Department of Health and Human Services and adviser to Sen. Mitch McConnell, will serve as director of the domestic policy council. The Heritage Foundation’s Paul Winfree will serve as Bremberg’s deputy. Rounding out the council’s positions announced Thursday: Katy Talento on health care policy, Ja’Ron Smith on urban affairs and revitalization, Rob Goad on education policy, John Zadrozny on justice and homeland security policy, Zina Bash on regulatory reform, legal and immigration policy, and Peter White as a senior policy analyst.
Stephen Miller, Trump’s senior policy adviser, will oversee the domestic policy council, according to the release.
